title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 320.4 - Revision of required forms by the department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 320.4 - Revision of required forms by the department

State Regulations

Local social services agencies having approved local
equivalents of required forms supplied by the department shall be required to
resubmit such forms for approval if: (a) the department makes revisions in the
required form; and
(b) the
department requests such resubmission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
320.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
